title: Artificial intelligence system learns to diagnose, classify intracranial hemorrhage

title_detail.value: Artificial intelligence system learns to diagnose, classify intracranial hemorrhage

summary: A team of investigators has developed a system using artificial intelligence to quickly diagnose and classify brain hemorrhages and to provide the basis of its decisions from relatively small image datasets.

summary_detail.value: A team of investigators has developed a system using artificial intelligence to quickly diagnose and classify brain hemorrhages and to provide the basis of its decisions from relatively small image datasets.
